attributes.action: end the governments covert use of planning laws to restrict the supply of housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government must remove all the restraints on home building open and hidden, especially the clandestine use of the planning laws, there is only one reason for the shortage of housing and that is government is using all administrative means possible to prevent them being built. The politicians who permit and participate in the systems limiting the supply of houses are committing a human rights crime and should expect to be held to account in a criminal court
